content.question: Which of the following best describes the state of the object myStudent as a result of executing this code segment?

choices.label: myStudent has been initialized such that name contains the string "Bobby" and age is 0.
myStudent has been initialized such that name contains the string "Bobby" and age is 25.
myStudent has been initialized such that name is null and age is 0.
myStudent has been initialized such that name is null and age is 25.

content.answer: myStudent has been initialized such that name contains the string "Bobby" and age is 0.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
